parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The steering wheel wanders off to one side
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering wheel has a large amount of play

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Pump Failure Causing Power Steering Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the power steering belt to slip or lock up, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Water leaks onto the power steering belt

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front End Suspension and Steering Component Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of front end suspension and steering components can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: Continued problems and failures of front end parts

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering hose coupling can cause loss of power steering, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-miss situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lower Control Arm Ball Joint Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower control arm ball joint can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and can also lead to damage to other components.
symptoms: the tire folds under the car
the vehicle makes a grinding noise
the vehicle pulls to one side.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Front end misalignment can cause uneven tire wear, reduced vehicle stability, and increased risk of accidents.
Axle failure can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and can also lead to damage to other components.
Wheel stud failure can cause the wheel to come loose, leading to loss of vehicle control and accidents.
Electrical system issues can cause various problems, including failure of essential systems, increased risk of accidents, and inconvenience to the driver.
symptoms: The seat belt doesn't click to stay in position
the interior lights don't turn off
the engine doesn't want to turn over
the cluster doesn't mark the speed correctly

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The arcing in the electrical system can cause a fire, potentially leading to vehicle destruction and risk of injury or death.
symptoms: Intense static on the AM radio
arcing sound when the ignition key is in the "run" position

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Auto Door Locks and Courtesy Lights Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto door locks and courtesy lights can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to safety issues, such as unlocked doors or poor visibility.
The failure of the wiring harness can cause the vehicle to stall, fail to restart, and potentially lead to a fire, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: wires inside the gas tank burned and melted plastic at the fuel tank hook-up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An internal door fire can cause significant damage to the vehicle and potentially lead to injury or death.
symptoms: Driver's side door catches fire and destroys the car.
